content: this crochet twist headband pattern is full of texture and looks store bought this cozy headband will keep your ears warm quick to make and perfect for gifts finished size fits most the headband is light-weight and super stretchy and uses crochet post stitches to give a gorgeous texture the easy twist detail adds an on-trend stylish edge to the design the pattern is written for a dk weight yarn or a light worsted yarn both weights work great **measurements** the measurements given are a guideline only the headband is very stretchy and will fit most sizes easily pattern includes 2 sizes with size small in brackets small/medium 18in to 20in 46 51cm wide and 4in 10cm depth medium/large 21in to 23in 53 58cm wide and 4in 10cm depth
